mapper.sql: id, bind_id, bind_time, telA, telB, telX, expire_time
mapper.insert: insert into pns ( bind_id, bind_time, telA, telB, telX, expiration ) values ( #{bindId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp(), #{tela,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiration,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
